attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Eon, British Gas... are poised to hike domestic utility-bills by 40%; I have wads of UK£50-notes in my panty-drawer next to the gold-bullion, coke-bags...

More realistically, lets have an immediate 40% reduction paid for from rolling power-cuts; Eon, British Gas... ordered to sell Gas, Electricity bought in advance.

Insane petrol & diesel prices are already contributing to unemployment given people can no longer work.  Together with food... prices mortgages, credit-card... loans are unaffordable.

Any bookies out-there ready to take bets on which high-street banks are on the brink of collapse?

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
